title: Ticket #4509: Windows: default configuration file has an error
description: From HTCondor-Users: I just want to point out there is a typo in the default condor_config file, which is written: CONDOR_HOST = $$(FULL_HOSTNAME) instead of: CONDOR_HOST = $(FULL_HOSTNAME) (with a single $)
remarks:
2014-Aug-04 17:00:54 by johnkn:
note: this only happens if you choose the New Pool option in the installer dialogs. The problem is that when substituting in the config file, the $$ is necessary (because regex), but when appending new lines in the config file, the $$ isn't.
